PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-01752012-03-01,  ,  ,  TC, 
ActCanada Post Corporation Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Transport of ANDREW BARTHOLOMEW PATERSON of Winnipeg, Manitoba, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canada Post Corporation, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Robert C. Pletch.
AttachmentsAttachment
